meanings.definition: A view or representation of a city.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted vibrant cityscapes filled with tall buildings and bustling streets.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love to take photos of cityscapes when visiting new places.
meanings.sent3: The cityscapes in the painting seemed to come alive at night, whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, with cityscapes of memories and dreams blending together.
meanings.sent5: The cityscapes in his mind were a mosaic of colors and shapes, each telling a different story.

meanings.definition: The physical aspects or features of a city.
meanings.sent1: The cityscapes of New York include skyscrapers, parks, and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: Urban planners study cityscapes to create more efficient and sustainable environments.
meanings.sent3: The cityscapes of the future might include flying cars and robot assistants.
meanings.sent4: In her imagination, the cityscapes transformed into magical kingdoms with hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The cityscapes of Tokyo are a blend of traditional architecture and modern technology.
